ValidationRule.description: Fields in the Financial Section cannot be changed after Closed - Won or Closed - Lost
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Bypass_Validation_Rule), $UserRole.Name <> "Sales Operations", OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),"Closed Lost") ), OR( ISCHANGED( Existing_MRR__c ), ISCHANGED(Legacy_USD_Existing_MRR__c), ISCHANGED( Legacy_MRR_Commit__c ), ISCHANGED( Legacy_USD_MRR_Commit__c ), ISCHANGED( MRR_Commit__c ), ISCHANGED( MRR_Upside__c ), ISCHANGED(New_MRR__c) , ISCHANGED(USD_Existing_MRR__c), ISCHANGED(USD_MRR_Commit__c), ISCHANGED(CloseDate), ISCHANGED(ACVH__c), ISCHANGED(Legacy_ACV__c), ISCHANGED(Manual_ACV__c), ISCHANGED(USD_Total_ACV__c), ISCHANGED(Legacy_TCV__c), ISCHANGED(Manual_TCV__c), ISCHANGED(TCVH__c), ISCHANGED(OwnerId), ISCHANGED(Owner_Division__c), ISCHANGED(Owner_Sub_Division__c), ISCHANGED(Total_ACV_Admin__c), ISCHANGED( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Financial Section cannot be changed after Closed - Won or Closed - Lost
